name: C15 Vitamin C Super Booster
about: What it is: A fast-acting formula with 15 percent vitamin C thatu2019s clinically shown to brighten skin in as few as 15 minutes and visibly improve firmness, discoloration, and dullness...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:- 15% Vitamin C: Visibly evens tone and firms and defends against aging free-radical damage..- Ferulic Acid: Fights the look of discoloration and stabilizes vitamin C..- Ergothioneine: Visibly improves uneven tone and boosts vitamin C's efficacy...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This new and enhanced product is a faster and gentler formula with improved packaging. Ferulic acid helps fight against the look of discoloration while ergothioneine improves efficacy and the look of uneven tone for radiant, youthful-looking skin. It is clinically shown to boost glow and reduce the look of wrinkles in as few as 15 minutes...Clinical Results: In an independent clinical study with 30 subjects in 12 weeks, results based on twice daily usage include:.- Clinically shown to boost glow in as few as 15 minutes.- Clinically shown to visibly brighten and improve radiance and wrinkles..In an independent clinical trial with 30 subjects after 12 weeks, results based on a self-assessment included:.- 100% agree feels non-irritating on skin
ingredients: -15% Vitamin C: Visibly evens tone and firms and defends against aging free-radical damage..-Ferulic Acid: Fights the look of discoloration and stabilizes vitamin C..-Ergothioneine: Visibly improves uneven tone and boosts vitamin C's efficacy...Water (Aqua/Eau), Ascorbic Acid, Glycerin, Ethoxydiglycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Mannitol, Tridecapeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Ergothioneine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Bisabolol, Sodium Gluconate, Decylene Glycol, Ferulic Acid, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Tocopherol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use once or twice daily..-Dispense two to three drops into the palm of your hand..-Apply to your face. .-Add more drops if you will also be applying to your neck and chest..-Can be applied under the eye area, avoiding the eye itself..-May be used alone or added to your favorite non-SPF moisturizer or serum..-For daytime, always finish with SPF 30+.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesnu2019t do anything.  The drunk elephant one is far better and delivers quick results. I wanted to try something else but wouldnu2019t recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the old formula years ago and remembered it being quite effective, so I bought this recently to lighten some blotchy red patches and I'm very impressed with it so far, I see results overnight and the formula seems stronger than before and isn't oxidizing as quickly. 10/10 as usual. Every product I've tried from Paula's is highly effective, don't cause breakouts and are worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s my first time using a Vitamin C serum and Iu2019ve been really liking it so far! My primary concern was with dullness and I feel that it did brighten up my skin. I do find this a bit pricier than other Vitamin C serums so I would shop around and try a few before committing.

reviews.review_title: Amazing but is sometimes already oxidized :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic vitamin c, definitely not cheap but I've seen significant results from this so it's worth the price I'd say. It's super lightweight, awesome for oily-combo skin, and has really helped brighten my skin and even out overall complexion. The only thing that sucks is that there seems to be some inconsistencies with production in terms of the product's stability. Usually I don't have an issue and every time I open a new bottle it's completely clear and lasts well, however the last 2 bottles in a row that I've purchased were already oxidized as soon as I opened the bottle :( Definitely not worth paying 75 dollars for a product that is essentially useless if it's already oxidized, so I'm not sure if I want to continue using this product or not. I love the results I get from it but it's quite annoying to keep having to return a bottle because of batch stability issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looked 10x more glowy and radiant after using this. It also helped even out dark spots and overall just brightened my whole face up. I truly love this product. I would definitely repurchase and recommend to anyone dealing with dull looking skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very effective in reducing my hyperpigmentation. My stubborn acne scars and freckles disappeared after using this serum for two to three weeks. The findings truly astonished me because vitamin C serums don't usually work.

This product is magic! A glow in 15 seconds! Plus vitamin C is perfect for spots! I saw a change in just 2 weeks! The texture is not too oily and does not oxidize quickly! My acne has improved and it really helps. The smell is not unpleasant at all, it does not stink, and no perfume perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product helps to soften and brighten my skin and provides me with a great base for makeup. It has effectively made my skin less dull and helps my skin to look more awake. It has also removed dark spots and acne scars.

reviews.review_title: Broke out with a horrible rash!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After only using for a few days, this gave me an AWFUL rash while away on a trip. Itu2019s burning, painful, flakey and itchy. My under eye has been swollen for 5 days now despite quitting using it immediately after I started seeing signs. Definitely returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So good at clearing my hyperpigmentation. I have freckles and acne scars that refuse to go away but this serum helped it in about two to three weeks. I was really surprised with the results as vitamin c serums normally donu2019t work.

I used this product in my skincare routine twice a week. It is very concentrated, and from the first use, I noticed a glow on my skin. However, when I used it more than twice a week, it caused irritation on my nose. I found that my skin became dry and sensitive in those areas. The concentration of the product seems too high for daily use, especially for sensitive skin like mine. Consequently, I do not recommend using it daily. For those with less sensitive skin, it may be beneficial to use it twice a week as I did, but it is important to observe how your skin reacts and adjust the frequency accordingly. Always perform a patch test on a small area of skin before incorporating a new product into your regular routine. Moderation is key to avoiding adverse reactions and maintaining healthy, glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has been going through a phase due to hormonal acne and the vitamin C serum has brought such a glow to my skin. Itu2019s not too heavy for my oily and acne prone skin, super gentle and I have been loving the results so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think I have tried half dozen high end vitamin C serums from Sephora.   A few weeks back for my 64th birthday, I was given my usual gift card and while browsing the store the Rep From Paula's choice recommended this product . Well I think I can stop searching for that perfect vitamin C cause this is IT .  Not only does it brighten but I feel it firms as well ..Try it yourself ladies .

Plus, my skin feels way firmer and those fine lines are barely there now. I use it every morning before my moisturizer. Love the new packaging too. Total game-changer for my skincare routine!

reviews.review_title: New formula is lightweight and non-irritating!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a skin booster, this gives my face a nice glow after application. This new and improved formula has a really thin and lightweight consistency that is easy to work with and absorbs quickly into the skin. I love that the formula is gentle and has not been irritating to my skin after repeated use. It does have a slight smell to it, but a lot of Vitamin C products have this same smell, especially when mixed with ferulic acid. I will continue to use this to see even better results over time when it comes to evening out my skin tone and reducing the look of fine lines. Thank you Paulau2019s Choice for kindly gifting me this product in exchange for my honest review!

Thank you for giving me the opportunity to test this product.

J'ai commence u00e0 utiliser ce produit il y a 10 jours et je vois deju00e0 u00e0 quel point ma peau est beaucoup plus eclatante avec cette reformulation. J'en utilise quelques gouttes sur tout le visage et le cou tous les jours avant ma creme hydratante et, tres important, je mets du SPF ensuite. A noter que sa texture est aqueuse, une fois applique et masse pour penetrer, il laisse une sensation de douceur sur la peau. Mon nouveau coup de cu0153ur.

reviews.review_title: This Vitamin C is the one you need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is glowing since I started using this product. It helped a lot with my pimple spots and fine lines near my eyes, they are less noticeable now. I am someone who smiles with their eyes and this Vitamin C made a big change in my skin's firmness. I use it morning and night before applying my moisturizer. I'll leave before/after pictures so you can see!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the C15 Vitamin C Super Booster, it feels light when applied to my skin. I added it to my skincare routine and saw improvement on my sensitive skin. Brightness and softness at their best. Definitely recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the new C15 Vitamin C Super Booster and after using it for a couple of weeks Iu2019ve noticed a huge difference in my skins tone and overall firmness. I mix it in with my face cream and it apply so nicely it leaves my skin looking bright and hydrated! This will definitely be a staple in my skin care routine and I canu2019t wait to see the full benefits!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Paulau2019s Choice C15 vitamin C Super Booster was gifted to me by Paulau2019s Choice and Skeepers.  I will start with the slight cons, which in my opinion, are easy to get past and youu2019ll want to for the pros of this product. First, itu2019s slightly watery. When I applied it with my fingers alone, it started to drip and it was absorbing quicker into my into my skin than I could put it on. My fix for that was to use less if applying with your fingers, or even better, add it in with the serum or moisturizer of your choice. The second slight con is it has a bit of an earthy smell, which isnu2019t that appealing. My fix is the same as the first; use it with a nice smelling serum or moisturizer if it bothers you. If youu2019d rather not use anything, thankfully the smell is not so overwhelming or overpowering and it doesnu2019t stay too long once on your skin.  if you can get past it while applying it, youu2019re good.   Now that I have put out what I thought were cons, hereu2019s the pros. Everything else. Brighter skin. Smoother skin. Softer skin. I almost could not believe how well a product worked in a short amount of time.  I tried to use it twice a day, but sometimes only used it once and still experienced a noticeable difference to my face. And a little goes a long way.   I will say honestly, the very first time I used this product, I did experience slight redness and irritation, but only for a few minutes and then going forward, there was neither.  Personally, my skin has a tendency to become a little red or sensitive with new products, so it may have just been my own skin and even so, it truly wouldnu2019t stop me from using it. I canu2019t believe how amazing my skin feels.   After using it for nearly two weeks, my sensitive skin looks and feels flawless, without drying it out and it makes me feel confident and radiant. Paulau2019s Choice is my choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product at night and while Iu2019ve used vitamin c products before, this one felt quite liquidy and I did notice it had quite a strong smell. I am going to keep trying it though because I do feel like it helped with skin brightening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paula's Choice C15 Super Booster is an exceptional addition to any skincare regimen, particularly for those seeking to address skin tone, discoloration, and radiance. After incorporating this product into my routine for two weeks, I observed notable improvements in my skin's overall appearance and texture. The formulation, which combines 15% Vitamin C with Vitamin E and Ferulic Acid, significantly enhanced my skin's tone and luminosity. Areas of discoloration and uneven skin tone were visibly reduced, resulting in a more uniform and vibrant complexion. Additionally, there was a marked reduction in the appearance of fine lines, particularly around the eyes and mouth, indicating an improvement in skin firmness. The C15 Super Booster integrates seamlessly into a daily skincare routine. I applied a few drops each morning after cleansing and before moisturizing and applying sunscreen. The lightweight formula absorbs rapidly, leaving no sticky residue, and is suitable for layering under other skincare products. It is important to highlight that this product features a new and improved reformulation, which may enhance its effectiveness. In summary, Paula's Choice C15 Super Booster is a highly effective product for improving skin tone, radiance, and firmness, making it a valuable addition to any professional skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This helps to brighten my skin and also Iu2019ve use this only a couple times but I can already see a huge help on my uneven skin tone. I really love this product Iu2019m happy to add this in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

I feel like it really does give me a boost in brightening and evening out my skin tone as I struggle with dry, flaking sensitive skin from my eczema! It has helped so much and trust me when I say, a little goes a long way!!

reviews.review_text: Started using the C15 vitamin C super booster a week ago and I can already see a different with the glow inmy skin. This product has a supper runny watery consistency so it doesnt mix well with cream moisturizers as a booster but I like just putting it on alone under my moisturizer. reviews.review_title: Love using this in my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product! My skins texture has improved and I use this every morning/evening. I put some drops on my face and neck but during the day make sure to apply SPF! The new reformulation took my skin a few tries to get used to but my skin loves it now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Paula's Choice C15 Vitamin C Super Booster for almost a week and I'm really enjoying it. While I didn't notice improved brightness in 15 minutes of using, I think it has slightly brightened my dark spots. The serum is very watery  so you have place in your palms to apply. It has that hotdog smell because of the Ferulic Acid  but it doesn't linger. I'm also using with Paula's Choice Azelaic Acid Booster and like this combo. My skin seems very smooth & bright so looking forward to long term results with continued use. #giftedbyPaulasXhoice

reviews.review_title: an upgrade in my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm currently in a very intense exam week, which is putting me under a lot of stress and causing several dark spots and pimples on my face. So I started using the new reformulated version of Pola's choice C15 Super Booster, and here's what I thought of it. I've been using it every night, just after cleansing my face, for about a week and a half. From the very first use, I noticed that my skin was much more radiant. Over the last few uses, I've been really impressed with this product. It has given my face that dull skin look I've been trying to get for a long time, made all my pimples disappear and evened out my skin tone (if that makes sense). This product has been an upgrade in my skincare routine and I won't hesitate to buy it again when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After only two weeks of using, I am a big fan of this product! This Paulau2019s Choice super booster has already helped improve my complexion and brightness. I use it with the Paulau2019s Choice 10% azelaic acid and that combo is so amazing for my skin tone. I havenu2019t had a single breakout in two weeks. The formula is also very light and comfortable. Would recommend!

This C15 Vitamin C Super Booster is lit! My skinu2019s been glowing like crazy, and those annoying zits? Gone. Itu2019s like a filter IRL. Totally recommend if you wanna keep your face fresh and poppin ! I love it!

I cant wait to see better results in the weeks to come. I can already see my dark spots lighter and the lines in my face actually improved. This is a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this new formulation of the C15 Vitamin C Super Booster! I ended up using a couple of drops in my moisturizer everyday and noticed a difference! I feel like it really does give me a boost in brightening and evening out my skin tone, I seem to glow more after using this. The formula is fully liquid so I preferred mixing this in with another product but I will be adding this to my staple skincare routine! reviews.review_text: *Gifted Review* This is a super vitamin C serum! If you struggle with any dullness or need to lighten up some hyperpigmentation this is a game changer! The formula isnu2019t irritating at all and itu2019s great to mix into a moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing results! I have dry and sensitive skin and this product didnu2019t irritate my skin whatsoever! I highly recommend this product for anyone! It made my skin glowy and clear as well as more firm! I use this in my morning skincare routine!

I love the new reformulation of Paulau2019s Choice C15 Super Booster. I use it after toner and before moisturizer in my routine in the mornings. I have noticed my skin has been firmer, more radiant, and my skin tone has looked much more even. I have very sensitive skin and didnu2019t find this irritating at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have finally tried this new and improved version of PC's vitamin C Booster, and I am so glad I did. I didn't know how better my skin could look until I started using this booster. My skin looks bright, radiant, and even. My combination skin loves this booster. I use it in my daytime and nighttime skincare routine and never skip the SPF during the day.

Le Serum C15 Vitamin C Super Booster de Paulau2019s Choice est un excellent produit pour ameliorer l'eclat et l'uniformite du teint. Avec 15 % de vitamine C pure, enrichi en vitamine E et acide ferulique, ce serum a considerablement reduit mes taches brunes et raffermi ma peau apres quelques semaines d'utilisation. La texture legere s'absorbe rapidement sans laisser de residu collant. Bien tolere mu00eame par les peaux sensibles, il justifie son prix par son efficacite et sa longue duree d'utilisation. Je le recommande vivement pour une peau plus lumineuse et uniforme.

reviews.review_title: Great for people with a dull complexion!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product changed the game for my dull skin! It is a new and improved formula!! You can see how glowy my skin is!! Feels amazing! I always use this before my moisturizer, it works the best for me! Its great!

reviews.review_title: Instant glow, my redness is diminished!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The new and improved reformulation has made my skin glow like never before! After using as apart of my daily routine I noticed my skin looks radiant and smooth. As a mom using it e with my spf during the day has been my go to for a quick and easy daily boost to the look of my dry skin. Highly recommend this to transform your dull skin. Summer is here, it's time to glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! it has been reformulated and has even more amazing benefits than before! paulau2019s choice is such a great brand and their products work so well. it made my skin firmer and healthier in just a couple weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Vitamin C with Vitamin E + Ferulic Acid Serum for a week now, and I am very impressed with the results. First off, the serum is lightweight and doesn't feel heavy on my skin, which is a big plus for me. It absorbs quickly, leaving my face and neck feeling refreshed and hydrated without any greasy residue. After just one week of consistent use, I can already see a noticeable difference in my skin. It looks brighter, more radiant, and has a healthy glow. The combination of Vitamin C and E with Ferulic Acid seems to work wonders together, providing a powerful antioxidant boost that has visibly improved my complexion. I also appreciate that it hasn't caused any irritation or breakouts, which is often a concern with new skincare products. Overall, I highly recommend this serum for anyone looking to enhance their skincare routine with an effective and gentle product. It delivers on its promises and has quickly become a staple in my daily regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Generally pretty good. I like how itu2019s not scented and doesnu2019t irritate my skin. I have pretty sensitive and dry skin. It absorbs really fast as well. Iu2019d recommend for the girlies with sensitive skin but still wants to try using vitamin C.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Paulau2019s Choice complimentary. They came out with a new formulation for their C15 Booster. The consistency is thinner and less sticky than before, making it easy to mix with my daily moisturizer. I have noticed a beautiful glow to my skin after using it, I would recommend patch testing. I have sensitive skin and usually have trouble with products that incorporate vitamin C. It would cause irritation or breakouts, but this product has been gentle and non-irritating. There is also no lingering smell, which is a huge plus for me. But I donu2019t believe this product will targets my concerns, being that it targets fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_title: A must in your skincare routine ud83dude0d
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The C15 Vitamin C Super Booster from Paula's Choice has become a must in my skincare routine. I have noticed that it has brightened my complexion and reduced the appearance of dark spots. It has also helped smooth out fine lines specifically in my forehead, giving my skin a more youthful look. I love that itu2019s a lightweight formula that absorbs quickly without leaving any residue, which makes it easy to layer with other products. I haven't experienced any irritation, which is great considering its potency and the sensitivity of my skin. Overall, this booster is an excellent choice if youu2019re looking to enhance skin's radiance and address signs of aging.

reviews.review_text: This product is a game changer, I tried this and really impressed with the results. This works great for my sensitive skin. This is for dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles. I love vitamin c in skin care products

It's become a staple in my daily skincare regimen, and I can't imagine going without it.
